thread.section_title: LightInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 LightInTheBox 的点评意见 | www.lightinthebox.com
thread.title: Mikkel

author: Mikkel
title: Mikkel
text:
I made a account on LightInTheBox, just to find out the shipping cost for some items. I found it to be a little bit too expensive, so i decided not to buy it.
The problem begins now. From that day where i created the account, I've received 4-7 spam emails each day! Of course I'm a little annoyed about that, and i therefore use their unsubscribe function.
That didn't work the first time, since i got more spam mails. Didn't work the third, sixth or eleventh time either.
I'm still getting spam mails, so i wrote LightInTheBox to stop, but they didn't answer.
My only option was to ask my email supplier to block all emails coming from LightInTheBox.
So poor service!
